# Project Instructions

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
  - Project type: React (Vite)
  - CSS: Tailwind CSS
  - Backend: Supabase

- [x] Scaffold the Project
  - Created Vite + React project.
  - Setup Tailwind CSS v4.

- [x] Customize the Project
  - Created Supabase SQL setup script (`supabase_setup.sql`).
  - Implemented TicketForm, TicketCard, AdminDashboard.
  - Set up Routing with `react-router-dom`.
  - Configured Supabase Client (`src/lib/supabaseClient.js`).

- [x] Install Required Extensions
  - Installed dependencies: `@supabase/supabase-js`, `lucide-react`, `react-router-dom`.

- [x] Compile the Project
  - Verified with `npm run build`.

- [x] Create and Run Task
  - Included standard npm scripts (`dev`, `build`, `preview`).

- [x] Launch the Project
  - Run `npm run dev` to start the development server.
  - Ensure `.env.local` is configured with Supabase credentials.

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete
  - README.md exists.
  - This instructions file is up to date.
